stanza.line: In the old age black was not countedfair
Or if it were it bore not beautyname
But now is black beauty successiveheir
And beauty slandered with a bastardshame
For since each hand hath put on naturepower
Fairing the foul with art false borrowedface
Sweet beauty hath no name no holybower
But is profaned if not lives indisgrace
Therefore my mistress eyes are ravenblack
Her eyes so suited and they mournersseem
At such who not born fair no beautylack
Yet so they mourn becoming of theirwoe
That every tongue says beauty should lookso
